short_summary: Purchase SIDE BY SIDE UTV Kedgwick Detachment DFO
description: The Department of Fisheries & Oceans (DFO), Conservation and Protection program, has identified a need for one (1) side by side utility terrain vehicle (UTV) to conduct inland patrols (off road / ATV trails) where it is not accessible by regular vehicles.The UTV will be instrumental in enabling Fishery Officers to navigate challenging terrain and transport essential equipment.
full_summary:
# Purchase of Side-by-Side UTV for Kedgwick Detachment of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans
[link to announcement]() 
## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4450018196-Doc4455648030
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4450018196
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 14, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Procurement Category**: GD
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Conservation and Protection program, has identified a need for one (1) side-by-side utility terrain vehicle (UTV) to conduct inland patrols in areas inaccessible by regular vehicles. The UTV will be used to facilitate the navigation of challenging terrain and the transportation of essential equipment by Fishery Officers.

## Additional Information

* **Required UN/SPSC Code**: 25101905 (All terrain vehicles tracked or wheeled)
* **Regions of Delivery**: New Brunswick
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **End-User Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Kedgwick Detachment
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Dalton, Colleen (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: colleen.dalton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: This announcement has expired. [link to announcement]()
